General.Name: Geekco Technologies Corp
General.Description: Geekco Technologies Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates mobile applications in Canada. It offers FlipNpik, a mobile application for local shopping. The company is headquartered in Laval, Canada.
General.Address: 1600 Saint-Martin East Boulevard, Laval, QC, Canada, H7G 4R8
